0.title: Retirement; increase the amount of the employee contribution to PERS.
0.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-11-123, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase From 7-1/4% Of Earned Compensation To 9% Of Earned Compensation The Amount That Is Deducted From The Salary Of Each Member Of The Public Employees' Retirement System And Credited To The Member's Annuity Savings Account; To Amend Section 25-11-109, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Members Of The System Who Retire On Or After July 1, 2010, Shall Receive Credit For One-half-day Of Leave For Each Full Year Of Membership Service Accrued After June 30, 2010, Which Leave Shall Be Added To The Lawfully Credited Unused Leave For Which Creditable Service Is Currently Provided; To Amend Section 25-11-115, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide A New Option For Members Of The System For Payment Of A Member's Retirement Allowance, Which Provides That Upon The Retired Member's Death, Three-fourths Of The Member's Reduced Retirement Allowance Will Be Continued Throughout The Life Of The Person Designated By The Member At The Time Of Retirement; And For Related Purposes.
